title: Mantle Fragment, 400–100 BC
medium:
Medium: wool
Technique: interlocked warps and wefts
description: Close set horizontal rows of stylized warriors' heads, each with different headdress and color combinations. On the top row, upright front-facing heads alternate with upside down heads in profile. In the next row, upright heads in profile alternate with upside down front-facing heads. Rich muted shades of brown, gold, tan, blue, green, purple, and white on a rust-red ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Mantle Fragment, 400–100 BC.
400–100 BC. Medium: wool
Technique: interlocked warps and wefts. Gift of Harvey Smith. 1951-17-1.
